movable.translation[0].definitions[0].de: able to be moved and not fixed in one place or position
movable.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: a teddy bear with movable arms and legs
movable.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a personal possession such as a piece of furniture
movable.translation[2].definitions[0].de: if something is movable, it is not fixed and can move, be moved, or change
movable.translation[2].definitions[0].ex: Governments may use movable exchange-rates to keep their economies competitive.
